TopAction

Action class to redirect the user to appropriate top-of-site

showPage

public function showPage()

Redirects the user to the appropriate top of page

  • friends timeline for a single-user instance
  • public timeline for a private instance
  • network timeline for public instance

Returns

  • void
public function showPage()
